card.description.leaderVelElleron:
*Arcane Leader*

*Leader Powers:* Steel Spark, AnÂ Encouragement, Fireball, Fiery Entrance
card.description.leaderVelRaminea:
*Arcane Leader*

*Leader Powers:* Spell 1, Spell 2, Spell 3, Spell 4
card.description.leaderNighterie:
*Arcane Leader*

*Leader Powers:* Shadow Spark, Nightmare Drain, Crystal Barrage, Army of Shadows
card.description.heroKroLah:
*Deploy:*
Choose an enemy row.
*Stun* and *Push 1* all units on that row.
card.description.heroCarienne:
*Deploy:*
Deal {damagePerWave} Damage to all enemy units.
Repeat once for every *Gathering Storm* in your Graveyard.
card.description.heroGarellion:
*End of round:*
*Consume* all remaining Mana.
Gain {powerPerMana} Power per Mana consumed.
card.description.heroAura:
*Deploy:*
*Summon* a Legendary card from your deck.
card.description.heroArgenta:
*Deploy:*
*Summon* an Epic card from your deck.
card.description.heroAntoria:
Whenever an ally takes damage while {name} is in your hand, redirect the damage to her.

If {name} is killed while in your hand, *Draw* a card.
card.description.heroAurienne: Whenever an ally takes lethal damage while {name} is in your hand, prevent it and *Play* {name} in front of this ally.
card.description.heroTroviar: Whenever another unit takes damage, gain {powerGained} Power.
card.description.heroMetrearte:
*Deploy:*
Choose a Leader Power from any Arcane Leader.
Gain a copy of it.
card.description.heroRagingElemental:
After {name} takes damage, it deals Damage equal to own Power to closest opposing enemy units.

Then, it destroys itself.
card.description.heroStormDancer:
*Deploy:*
For each *Gathering Storm* in your Graveyard, put a copy of it into your spell hand.
card.description.heroFlameDancer:
*Deploy:*
Apply *Burning* for {burnDuration} turns to all units on an enemy row.
card.description.heroLightOracle:
*Deploy:*
Look at top {cardsToSee} cards from your deck. Choose one to *Summon*.
card.description.heroDarkOracle:
*Deploy:*
Look at bottom {cardsToSee} cards from your opponent's deck. Choose one to *Discard*.
card.description.heroCrystalWarrior:
*Deploy:*
*Sacrifice* an allied unit.
Summon a *Crystal* in its place.
card.description.heroCultistOfAreddon:
*Deploy:*
Destroy an allied unit.
Then, *Create* a copy of it.
card.description.heroAdventuringGuildMas:
*Deploy:*
Gain +{powerPerCard} Power per other Unit played this turn.
card.description.unitRavenMessenger:
*Deploy:*
*Summon* a Bronze Human card from your deck.
card.description.unitPossessedVulture: If {name} kills an enemy creature, it gains *+{bonusPower} Power and *+{bonusAttack} Attack
card.description.unitUnfeelingWarrior:
*On turn start:*
If {name} was attacked last turn, he gains *+{bonusPower} Power
card.description.unitForestScout:
*Deploy:*
If you're losing on the board, gains {boardPowerBonus} Power.
If you're losing on Morale, gains {moralePowerBonus} Power.
card.description.unitMadBerserker: Every consecutive attack on the same target deals *3* more damage
card.description.unitSpinningBarbarian: {name} attacks up to 4 closest enemies on target row
card.description.unitChargingKnight:
*Melee Attack:* Deal {attack} Damage

Can *Melee Attack* only after performing a move
card.description.unitTwinBowArcher: {name} always attacks units directly to the left and to the right from the chosen target
card.description.unitVampireFledgling:
Loses {powerLost} Power per turn.

*Melee Attack:* Deal {attack} Damage. If damage is not blocked, then Restore {powerDrained} Power
card.description.unitPriestessOfAedine:
*Deploy:*
Restore {healing} Power to a damaged allied unit
card.description.unitSupplyWagon:
*Support:*
Grant an allied unit an extra move action this turn only
card.description.unitArcaneCrystal:
Generates {chargePerMana} *Charge* for every Mana you spend.

*Deathrattle:* Generate {manaGenerated} Mana for every {chargesForMana} *Charges* accumulated.

Charges accumulated: {charges} Will generate {potentialMana} Mana
card.description.unitFlameTouchCrystal:
Generates {chargePerMana} *Charge* for every Mana you spend.

*Deathrattle:* Create a *Tiny Sparkling* for each *Charge* accumulated.

Charges accumulated: {charges}
card.description.unitIceSkinCrystal:
Generates {chargePerMana} *Charge* for every Mana you spend.

*Deathrattle:* Give all adjacent allies {armorGranted} Decaying Armor for every {chargesForArmor} *Charges* accumulated.

Charges accumulated: {charges} Will grant {potentialArmor} Decaying Armor
card.description.unitStoneElemental:
*Deploy:*
Deal {damage} Damage to any other unit
card.description.unitOracleApprentice:
*Deploy:*
Look at the top card of any deck
card.description.unitLoneLooter: Whenever you apply a *Status effect* to an enemy unit, *Summon* one {name} from your deck.
card.description.unitVolatileCrystal:
*Deathrattle:*
Deal {damage} Damage to adjacent units on the same row.
card.description.unitUndercityGambler:
*Deploy:* Choose a non-temporary card in your unit hand to return into your deck.

*Draw* a card and give it +{bonusPower} Power.
card.description.spellSpark:
*Hero Power*

Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit
card.description.spellSpeedPotion:
*Hero Power*

Grant an allied unit {moves} extra move actions this turn only
card.description.spellPermafrost:
*Hero Power*

Grant all allies *Immune* until your next turn
card.description.spellRainOfFire:
{name} deals {damage} damage to {targets} enemy units
Then, it draws a card
card.description.spellMagicalStarfall:
{name} increases Power of all allies units by *3* and Attack by *2*
Then, it draws a card
card.description.spellGatheringStorm:
Deal {damage} Damage to {targetCount} enemy units.

Number of targets increases by {targetsPerStorm} for every {name} in your Graveyard.
card.description.spellSteelSpark:
*Leader Power*

Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Deal {sideDamage} Damage to adjacent units on the same row.
card.description.spellAnEncouragement:
*Leader Power*

Choose an allied unit. Next turn, it gains {bonusPower} Power.
card.description.spellFireball:
*Leader Power*

Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Deal {areaDamage} Damage to all adjacent units.
card.description.spellFieryEntrance:
*Leader Power*

*Summon* a top card from your deck.
card.description.spellShadowSpark:
*Leader Power*

Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Spawn a *Shadowspawn* on your front row.
card.description.spellNightmareDrain:
*Leader Power*

Choose a damaged unit.

Spawn a *Shadowspawn* on your front row. It gains bonus Power equal to Power the target misses.
card.description.spellCrystalBarrage:
*Leader Power*

Choose an enemy row.

Spawn *Volatile Crystals* around every unit on this row.
card.description.spellShadowArmy:
*Leader Power*

*Create* a copy of an allied unit. If it has {powerThreshold} Power or less, repeat this effect.

This value decreases by {thresholdDecrease} after every copy.
card.description.spellFlamingSpark:
*Leader Power*

Deal {damage} Damage to an enemy unit.

Deals {damagePerWeave} extra Damage per stack of *Weave*
